issue.title: Filter menu "objecttype" based on users rights
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

When entering "My object" menu in the frontend, the application displays the list of objects related to the logged account.
Above the list, there is a menu with list of possible objects' types. The list should be filtered based on user's rights.

It's more cosmetic... but important since a user could see type of objects he cannot access/create/modify.

_For example, if he has only rights on "objet A" and "object B" and not "object C", the list should contains "object A, object B"._ 



**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Has been realized with easySDI V4 version...
Not voted beforehand but has been implemented as discussed during easySDI 2013 workshops...
